texts.en: Makhir is 32 years old, and is from a small village in the Bolnisi district. He lives with his wife and parents. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have a plot of agricultural land, where they grow potatoes. They do all the agricultural work: cultivate the land, sow the seeds, and harvest. The harvested potatoes are sold locally at a good price. Each member of the family works hard to ensure a good harvest. Makhir has a lot of experience in his business. He requested a loan to purchase potato seeds. After buying the seeds he will be able to sow and sell the harvested potatoes. This will increase the income of the family. With an increase in income they will be able to improve their living conditions. Makhir awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase potato seeds for farming

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a 43-year-old married woman with nine children from Talibon, Bohol. Together with her husband, she has been in the buy-and-sell business for 30 years. This is the source of her income, and funds their daily needs.  She earns 2,000 PHP monthly. 

Erlinda is requesting a loan to buy additional items such as lanterns, slippers, toys, and fancy jewelry. Through this loan, she will be able to buy more stock for her business, so that people will have many choices. This is especially important now, for gifts and decorations in the Christmas season. 

In the future, Erlinda hopes to expand and develop her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items like lanterns, slippers, toys, and fancy jewelry to resell.

loans.name: Vergjinush

texts.en:
Vergjinush, an Egyptian lady in her early sixties is looking for a social loan to buy and install a window and door to her one-room house. She lives in the south-central area of Albania where the cold temperatures and snowy weather start by mid November.  She has been suffering by living in an open room with the windows and doors covered by blankets and cardboards. Vergjinush has a 24-year-old son who works hard to provide for both of them.

Vergjinush is almost begging lenders to help her financially and wants them to know in advance that she will pay the loan because this is not her first loan, it’s the third and she has successfully paid the previous ones. Vergjinush also wants lenders to know that she would very much appreciate their compassion.

loans.use: To buy and install a door and window to her one-room house

loans.name: Rohat

texts.en:
Rohat is 27 years old and has a lovely husband who is a migrant worker. She has two children living at home. Rohat tries to provide them a higher quality of living. With this aim, six months ago she began own business, selling "kuraga" (sun-dried apricots) She buys the apricots for processing and also sells the kuraga in the market of a region where there is more demand than in her region. 

Her mother-in-law helps her in the business. From any profits she buys necessary things for living but her income is small and her husband doesn’t earn and send enough money to help to improve their living condition. Rohat wants to buy additional kuraga to help her business grow and develop, but the income is small and she can’t do it.

Rohat is asking for a loan of 1,000 TJS to buy kuraga to help develop the business. Each month she will make her payment on time. She is a repeat client of IMON International and has a good credit history. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy for more kuraga for her developing business.

loans.name: Consolee

texts.en:
Consolee is 30 years old. She runs a canteen and has been in the business for the past four years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy andazi, chapati and other types of bread for the canteen. She plans to put profits towards savings for the future.

loans.use: To buy andazi, chapati and other kinds of bread for her canteen.

loans.name: Olive

texts.en:
Olive is 34 years old. For a living, she sells different items in a general store. 

She would like the loan to buy more cooking oil, rice, and lotions for sale. Any profits from the business will be saved for the future.

loans.use: To buy more cooking oil, rice and lotions for sale.

loans.name: Beatha

texts.en:
Beatha is 31 years old. She owns a bar and has been running that bar for the past nine years. With the loan, she wants to add more alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks for sale. 

The profits from the business will be used to pay her children’s school fees.

loans.use: To buy more alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks for sale.

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en:
Esterlita is a married woman and has three young children.  She lives in Talibon, Bohol. She has been involved in seaweed farming for 10 years together with her husband. This is the source of her income.

Esterlita is requesting for a loan to buy straw, seaweed seedling to be planted, and labor.  In the future, Esterlita dreams of expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy straw, seaweed seedlings, and labor

loans.name: Tuyatsetseg

texts.en:
Tuyatsetseg is 50 years old, married, and a mother of 6 children. She lives in a small house with her husband and 4 children in Ulaanbaatar city, capital of Mongolia. Her husband Adilaa works long hours as a taxi driver to support the family. Two elder daughters live separately. Her two sons 18 and 20 are both attending university. The younger two children go to secondary school near their home.

Tuyatsetseg has operated a retail butcher business in the biggest meat market in Ulaanbaatar city for 16 years. She has gained valuable experience in previous years, and has a loyal customer base. She is grateful to those responsible for making her dream come true of giving her children a good education and morals. In the past she has borrowed money from our organization seven times and paid her loan on established deadlines. She is a very reliable and hardworking individual. She is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to purchase a variety of meat to expand her business and increase her income.

loans.use: To expand her business and to purchase more meat.

loans.name: Saada

texts.en: Saada is a mother of three children who are aged between seven and ten. She sells fruit and has been in the business for two years. With this loan, she wants to buy more vegetables for sale. The profits from the business will be used to add to her savings.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 59 años de edad, es una mujer muy alegre, dinámica y emprendedora, esta divorciada. Viven junto a  sus dos hijos mayores de 31 y 25 años de edad en su casa propia, la cual logró construir con el apoyo su ex esposo. El trabajo de María, consiste en la venta de comidas y bebidas, lo cual lo realiza todos los sábados y domingos y feriados en su local, ubicado en su propia casa. Cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos que le ayudan en la  preparación y atención al publico. Paralelo a esta actividad también se dedica a la venta de bebidas gasificadas durante los días de la semana contando con una refrigeradora  que compró con sus ahorros. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite tener un ingreso económico, lo que no le gusta es que los precios de los productos para la elaboración de sus comidas suben de precio, y eso varia en sus ganancias. Ella sigue esforzándose  gracias a que su puesto es muy concurrido  teniendo todas la ganas de ampliar su negocio. Con el préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles, comprará materiales para arreglar su negocio como calaminas y listones para arreglar el techado y con el saldo lo invertirá en la compra de los ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de sus parrilladas.
texts.en: Maria is 59 years old and is a happy, dynamic, enterprising woman.  She’s divorced and lives with her two adult children, ages 31 and 25, in a home of their own that she and her ex-husband built.  Maria sells food and drinks out of her home on the weekends.  She also sells at fairs in her neighborhood.  She has the support of her children and they help her prepare the food and serve customers.  She also sells soft drinks on weekdays and has a refrigerator that she bought with her savings.  What she likes about her work is that it allows her to have an income.  What she doesn’t like is that the prices for her supplies go up and this affects her profits.  She continues to make an effort, thanks to the fact that her stall is well visited and she has a great desire to expand her business.  She will use the 1000 PEN from this loan to buy supplies to fix the roof at her business.  She will use the rest to buy ingredients to prepare her parrilladas.

loans.use: building materials and ingredients.

loans.name: Damacia

texts.es:
La Sra. Damacia  tiene 48 años de edad,  tiene una farmacia en su casa, y comenta que se dedican en este trabajo desde el año 2000. Se inicio en esta actividad con la ayuda de una tía con quien trabajaba en lo mismo.
Ella es una persona que se ha esforzado desde siempre, y es gracias a su trabajo que esta pudiendo crecer y tener los medios que necesita para poder ayudar a su familia. La Sra. Damacia cuenta con una gran clientela y cada día tiene más pedidos.
El necesita de este crédito para la compra de  mas medicamentos, con lo cual quiere poder surtir y tener todo lo que sus clientes necesitan.
texts.en:
Damacia is 48 years old. She has a pharmacy in her house, and she says that she has been doing this work since the year 2000. She began this work with the help of an aunt who did the same work with her. 

She is a person who has always tried hard, and it’s thanks to her job that she is able to grow and have the necessary means in order to be able to help her family. Damacia has a large customer base, and every day, she has more orders.

She needs this loan for the purchase of more medicines, with which she wants to restock and have everything that her customers need.

loans.use: to purchase medications to sell.
